name: ui-personalization-heroku
description: Full-stack UI personalization app with AI-powered UI generation

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm ci --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
